description:
Commanding views of Long Island Sound define this spectacular five-bedroom residence on one of Larchmont's most coveted streets. Designed by acclaimed architect Robert Stern, every room is oriented to capture the breathtaking water views that change with the light throughout the day.

The great room soars to 22-foot ceilings and features a floor-to-ceiling stone fireplace, wide-plank white oak floors, and walls of glass opening to a wraparound terrace. The recently renovated kitchen features custom cabinetry, Quartzite countertops, and a Wolf/Sub-Zero appliance suite.

The primary suite occupies its own wing with a private balcony overlooking the Sound, spa bath with soaking tub, and a custom dressing room. Four additional bedrooms, including a first-floor guest suite, provide flexible living arrangements.
